resources.string: Organize your soccer games with style
Sign in with your Google account to get started
Registration is now done only via Google Sign-In.
You will be redirected to the login screen.
An error occurred. Please try again.
No internet connection. Check your network.
You don\'t have permission for this action.
Request timed out. Please try again.
Why not create the first game?
Owner name must have at least 3 characters
Number of players must be between 4 and 100
You need to be Owner or Admin of a group to create games
The system will automatically schedule the next game in the Recurrence Center.
Visible to all (App). Requires request to join.
Are you sure you want to cancel this game?
Image too large. Max size: 10 MB
Please enter name and select at least one field type
Add locations to see them on the map
Status can only be changed by Admins
Add a new location using the + button
Do you want to import/update the 52 default locations? This may take a few seconds.
Do you want to analyze and remove duplicate locations? The record with the most complete data will be kept.
Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\" and all its fields?
Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\"?
Configure schedules to automatically create weekly, biweekly or monthly games.
Do you want to stop this recurrence? New games will no longer be automatically scheduled for this series.
Note: Location and field can be set later. This schedule will automatically create games.
Allows other players to find your profile
Creates historical mock data (games, statistics, XP)
Adds fields to all existing locations
Removes invalid games, mock stats and pending invites
Organize your soccer games with style
Made with love for futebol lovers
Futeba dos Parças is the ultimate app for organizing amateur soccer games with friends. Create games, manage teams, track statistics and compete in rankings!
Leave your review on Play Store
Built with Kotlin Multiplatform and Jetpack Compose
© 2024 Futeba dos Parças. All rights reserved.
Invite players to start organizing games
This will recalculate the balance based on all entries and exits. Continue?
Do you really want to void this entry? This action cannot be undone.
Add your first entry or exit to start
Are you sure you want to transfer group ownership to \"%s\"?\n\nYou will become admin and cannot reverse this action.
No other members to transfer ownership to.
Name must have at least 3 characters
Missing %d XP for the next level
No active season at the moment.
Wait for the next season to start to climb the ranking!

• XP/game (40%%)
• Win rate (30%%)
• Goal difference (20%%)
• MVPs (10%%)
